name: Flitestar Academy
about: Flitestar Academy, located at Wilson Airport in Nairobi, Kenya, is a nationally accredited and recognized flight academy. We offer a range of KCAA approved courses, including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Multi-Engine Rating, Instrument Rating (IR), and Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL). Our comprehensive programs are designed to guide students through their entire aviation journey, ensuring they receive high-quality training and preparation for a successful career in aviation. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Flitestar Academy is your trusted partner in achieving your flying aspirations.
